name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.6-3c81e573a001aa6e16a6b6e693c14d4f35e3b433 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
